textSub.name: para1
textSub.string: It's oceanic rush hour! Be sure to yield\n the right of way to the bigger fish.\n They have important places to go!

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
HINT:
 When fish are stunned, they can't eat you, no matter how
 big they are! So feel free to get up close and personal - 
 until they wake up, of course.
